description:
Kozue may walk again after her upcoming surgery, but someone at the hospital doesn`t want her to live through it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wanting to Fall in Love Just Like a Dream. The Strategy of a Twelve Year-Old Angel (Part 2)
Yume Miru You ni Koishitai, 12 Sai Tenshi no Sakusen (Kouhen)
夢みるように恋したい 12歳天使の作戦(後編)
